transformations.name: MapDrifted1
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		weekly_count as integer,
		year_week as string,
		rate_14_day as double,
		cumulative_count as integer,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'covid',
	folderPath: 'raw/cases_deaths',
	fileName: 'cases_deaths.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> srcCasesDeaths
source(output(
		{_c0} as short,
		Country as string,
		{Alpha-2 code} as string,
		{Alpha-3 code} as string,
		Numeric as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'general',
	folderPath: 'processed',
	fileName: 'PopulationByCountry.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> srcCountryCodes
Select1 filter(equals(continent, 'Europe')) ~> ContinentEqEurope
ContinentEqEurope pivot(groupBy(year_week,
		country_code),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	{} = mean(rate_14_day),
	columnNaming: 'rate_$N$V',
	lateral: false) ~> pivotRateIndicator
ContinentEqEurope pivot(groupBy(year_week,
		country_code),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	{} = sum(weekly_count),
	columnNaming: 'weekly_count_$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> pivotCountIndicator
MapDrifted1, MapDrifted2 join(pivotCountIndicator@country_code == pivotRateIndicator@country_code
	&& pivotCountIndicator@year_week == pivotRateIndicator@year_week,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> MergePivotedData
srcCasesDeaths select(mapColumn(
		country_code,
		continent,
		indicator,
		weekly_count,
		year_week,
		rate_14_day,
		cumulative_count
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
MapDrifted1 aggregate(groupBy(year_week),
	weekly_count_cases = sum(weekly_count_cases),
		weekly_count_deaths = sum(weekly_count_deaths)) ~> TotalCasesDeathWeek
pivotCountIndicator derive(weekly_count_cases = toLong(byName('weekly_count_cases')),
		weekly_count_deaths = toLong(byName('weekly_count_deaths'))) ~> MapDrifted1
pivotRateIndicator derive(rate_cases = toDouble(byName('rate_cases')),
		rate_deaths = toDouble(byName('rate_deaths'))) ~> MapDrifted2
MergePivotedData derive(year = split(pivotCountIndicator@year_week,"-")[1]) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, srcCountryCodes lookup(year == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'covid',
	folderPath: 'processed/cases_deaths',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	partitionFileNames:['cases_deaths.csv'],
	umask: 0222,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkCasesDeaths
